channel.title: Please, don't be angry at how silly this question may seem
channel.description:
I am working on an older game called Lost Legends, a freeware action/RPG originally made by a group called Ghost Wood Games (www.ghostwoodgames.com); Their last released version was 0.2, or the 0.204 Beta version; Can anyone please tell me any of the following information: 1) What language is this game written in? 2) Has anyone heard of Ghost Wood Games or Grendel (the only person mentioned on the website)? I have tried every email address contact at the website and either receive a non-delivery email error or no response at all 3) Does anyone have any knowledge of this games' program engine? I just have a couple of questions regarding particulars that I would like to try and change in my copy of the game...
Any information you could provide would be of great assisstance... --Tarzanboy

item.title: Please, don't be angry at how silly this question may seem
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

Interesting find, I did some googling for lost legends sourcecode and turned up nothing, However after searching Grendel I did come up with this forum post http://omnimaga.org/index.php?topic=87.0 apparently an agrument took place between the developers and the project closed. http://lostlegends.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Source/

Pretty sure that that isn’t the game he is looking for, If i recall that game runs nice on Ti84 calculators.

This is what I found

http://www.gamespot.com/news/6163665.html:

Ghost Wood Games is a very small group of dedicated gamers, crafting the magic of Lost Legends from their fog shrouded tower on a craggy peak.

Read full topic
item.source: Please, don't be angry at how silly this question may seem
